attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: This app has had many glitches causing my phone to over heat. I had to try downloading it two times for it to full upload. Then once I finally got on it, it kept kicking me out saying there was a failure with my WiFi connection. Which was false because I went on other apps checking if my WiFi was strong and yes I did have all bars. Ridiculous app I do not recommend this to anyone unless your searching for a headache.
